Reviews.Title: BlackBerry 8520
Reviews.Author: edinson
Reviews.Content: This is a decent phone with some really great features. In town it perfect.Pay as You Go lets you stay connected with no monthly payments, no hidden fees; Wi-Fi networking plus Wi-Fi Calling capabilities2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion; personal and corporate e-mailUp to 4.5 hours of talk time, up to 408 hours (17 days) of standby time; released in August, 2009What's in the Box: handset, battery, charger, wired stereo hands-free headset, USB cable, quick start guide

Reviews.Title: Good BlackBerry but....
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: This is a decent phone with some really great features. It also will work perfectly with a 32GB memory card! HOWEVER...The problem for me is the limited T-Mobile coverage. In town it perfect, full bars everywhere but... Hit the highway on a road trip and my coverage ends just a few miles past the Colorado border. It's NO fun not having a signal while driving through the Utah desert!

Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: Btroopmomof5
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed my blackberry. It has a camera that takes beautiful pictures. My only complaint is that calls fail at times. It has something to do with it having wi-fi. I love my blackberry otherwise ....Karen from st. Louis

Reviews.Title: Seller Great but Phone was a Lemon
Reviews.Author: smann
Reviews.Content: Had phone for 1 day ball only work half the time I think it was a lemon, 1st blackberry so leary of another one.
